settings.subtitle: Browse & Select
settings.content:
• Explore the products via homepage, by categories or use the search bar to find specific items.  
  • Click Quick View or the product to get the product details.
  • Click Add to Cart to save the item for purchase.

settings.subtitle: Manage Cart
settings.content:
• Click the cart icon from the top right corner to view all selected items.
  • Adjust quantities by adding and removing items.

settings.subtitle: Proceed to Checkout
settings.content:
• Click Check Out and log in or proceed as a guest.
  • Input the shipping details or select a saved address.   
  • Add discount code or voucher if available. 
  • Select payment method and provide payment details.

settings.subtitle: Complete Purchase
settings.content:
• Click Pay Now and complete the purchase. 
  • An order confirmation email will be sent.
